name: Goal Runner AR
description:
Goal Runner is an Augmented Reality car soccer crossbar challenge for mobile! It was a solo project for an AR course during my studies. 

REQUIREMENTS

In the download you find an image called "chips.jpg" (bottom right picture) which is used for tracking and must be color printed in the size of A4.

INSTRUCTIONS

1. Position the camera on the image until the game world appears.

2. Have fun!

PLATFORM

Available for Android as an APK file.
